info.name: Library Management System - Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete RESTful API collection for Library Management System with all CRUD operations, role-based access control, and user activity logging. Includes MEMBER role for public users.

request.description: User login with username and password
Public user registration (defaults to MEMBER role)

item.name: üìö Book Management
item.description: Complete CRUD operations for book management with role-based permissions

request.description: Get all books (MEMBER, STAFF, LIBRARIAN, ADMINISTRATOR)
Get books that are available for borrowing
Get books filtered by language ID
Search books by title, author, or content

body.raw:
{
  "title": "New Book Title",
  "isbn": "978-1234567890",
  "publicationYear": 2024,
  "edition": "1st Edition",
  "summary": "A great new book",
  "totalCopies": 3,
  "availableCopies": 3,
  "categoryId": 1,
  "publisherId": 1,
  "languageId": 1
}

{
  "title": "Updated Book Title",
  "isbn": "978-1234567890",
  "publicationYear": 2024,
  "edition": "2nd Edition",
  "summary": "An updated great book",
  "totalCopies": 5,
  "availableCopies": 4,
  "categoryId": 1,
  "publisherId": 1,
  "languageId": 1

request.description: Get all library members (STAFF, LIBRARIAN, ADMINISTRATOR)
Search members by name or email

item.name: üë§ System User Management
item.description: User management with different permission levels

request.description: Get all system users (ADMINISTRATOR, LIBRARIAN only)
Get roles available for public registration (MEMBER only)
Create new system user (ADMINISTRATOR, LIBRARIAN only)
Get all borrowing transactions (MEMBER, STAFF, LIBRARIAN, ADMINISTRATOR)
Get all transactions for a specific member
Get all transactions for a specific book (STAFF, LIBRARIAN, ADMINISTRATOR)
Get transactions by status (BORROWED, RETURNED, OVERDUE, LOST)
Create new borrowing transaction (STAFF, LIBRARIAN, ADMINISTRATOR)

item.name: üìù Author Management
item.description: Author CRUD operations with mixed permissions

request.description: Get all authors (MEMBER, STAFF, LIBRARIAN, ADMINISTRATOR)
Search authors by name or biography
Get all user activity logs (ADMINISTRATOR, LIBRARIAN only)
Search activity logs by action text

item.name: üè∑Ô∏è Supporting Entities
item.description: Categories, Publishers, Languages, and Roles management
